decision_snapshot.decision: Use append-only JSONL node logs as authority and rebuildable indexes as derived artifacts.
decision_snapshot.title: Use append-only JSONL with derived indexes

goal: Resolve graph conflicts via tagged tasks

knowledge_snapshot.summary: Treat KG/RG/TG as the source of truth; do not rely on chat transcript for long-term memory.
knowledge_snapshot.title: Graphs are authoritative memory

knowledge_snapshot.summary: Knowledge Graph stores facts, Reasoning Graph stores decisions, Task Graph stores execution state.
knowledge_snapshot.title: Three-layer graph model

acceptance_criteria: Every conflict record has at least one TG resolution task
task_snapshot.title: Resolve graph conflicts via tagged tasks

acceptance_criteria: A timestamped context pack history file is written
task_snapshot.title: Maintain Context Pack for each meaningful interaction

acceptance_criteria: post_response_commits.jsonl has commit_id per meaningful response
Each commit entry includes changed node ids
task_snapshot.title: Record post-response commits
